available.BITIV: Business Interruption (BI) Total Insured Value. Enter an annualized amount, and use LocDed4BI and LocLimit4BI fields for non-annualized values
available.CondNumber: Condition number identifies a unique set of condition financial terms applicable to one or more CondTag's.
available.CondPriority: Condition priority: specifies the order in which special conditions apply if multiple conditions apply to one location.
available.CondTag: Identifies a group of locations which are subject to one or more conditions.
available.CountryCode: Country code (based on ISO3166 alpha-2 codes)
available.IsTenant: Whether property is occupied by a tenant or not
available.LayerAttachment: Policy layer attachment point (always treated as amount)
available.LayerLimit: Policy layer limit (always treated as amount)
available.LayerParticipation: Insurance company share of the policy layer. Values between 0 to 1 (e.g. 12% entered as 0.12)
available.NumberOfBuildings: Number of buildings. Default to 1 but user should enter '0' if unknown.
available.OEDVersion: The OED schema version of the file - 'major, minor, patch' format i.e. (2.0.0)
available.PolExpiryDate: Policy expiry date - in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD
available.PolInceptionDate: Policy inception date - in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD
available.PostalCode: Postcode: the highest resolution postcode most often used. (e.g. 5 digit zip for the US).
